dataList.dlg: You like fireworks, manager buds?
The sun's bright today. Should be more than enough light.
No wonder everyone was in a hurry, it was lunchtime.
Good grief, why do they have to keep everyone busy. Don't I deserve some time to smoke at least?
What's up? If you're bored, you're free to hang around with me for a bit.
Check this out, manager bud. Thanks to this, I don't need to carry a lighter around. I tried giving Ryōshū a light with this the other day, but she got all snappy, calling it inartistic or whatever.
Meursault? He's, eh... kinda like a brick wall, but others say we make a good team.
Isn't the prosthetic arm uncomfortable? Nah, not at all. You have no idea how much the lack of feeling helps me in fights. As long as it knows no pain, my arm's invincible. That's all I care.
I hate the frontline. If I can, I wanna stay at the back and chill, flinging some flames every so often.
Where'd you go, manager bud? Hm, guess I'll take a smoke break...
C'mon, I don't need all this stuff. You're pressuring me into working harder.
Sure, let's burn some stuff.
Not sure my body will work with me... But orders are orders.
What is it, manager bud?
Let's get right into it.
Pretty flammable, aren't ya?
Next.
Told you to watch it...
A better choice than I expected.
Fire can leave dire consequences if you aren't careful with it...
Hm, well... That punch I threw at the end was pretty cool, wasn't it?
Man, I strained myself. That's a week's worth of excuses I could use.
The ignition's not working well today...
